text: The is Japan's largest Asian studies library. It is one of the world's five largest libraries. It is located in Tokyo. It contains around 950,000 documents, written in Asian, Western and Japanese languages."The Library", Official Toyo Bunko website, retrieved 17 November 2009 It was started by Mitsubishi Motors and opened in 1924. == References == Category:Libraries in Japan Category:Buildings and structures in Tokyo
title: Tōyō Bunko
